plugins.name: Gename Thai
plugins.description:
Generate Random Thai Names Plugin


Quickly generate random Thai names for your designs! This plugin allows you to select one or multiple text fields and generate random names for males or females, with the option to include or exclude surnames.


❖ Generate Unique Names: Ensure each selected text field gets a distinct, random name.

❖ Customizable Gender Selection: Choose from male or female names based on your project needs.

❖ Surname Option: Add Thai surnames for a complete name experience.

❖ Easy Integration: Select your text fields, click "Generate", and watch your text change instantly!


---


สร้างชื่อไทยแบบสุ่มได้อย่างรวดเร็วสำหรับการออกแบบของคุณ! ปลั๊กอินนี้ช่วยให้คุณเลือกข้อความหนึ่งหรือหลายช่อง เพื่อสร้างชื่อสุ่มสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิง โดยเลือกได้ว่าจะมีนามสกุลหรือไม่มี


❖ สร้างชื่อที่ไม่ซ้ำกัน: ให้ชื่อที่สุ่มออกมาไม่ซ้ำกันในแต่ละช่องข้อความที่เลือก

❖ เลือกเพศได้ตามต้องการ: สามารถเลือกชื่อสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิงได้ตามความต้องการ

❖ ตัวเลือกนามสกุล: สามารถเพิ่มนามสกุลไทยให้กับชื่อได้

❖ การใช้งานง่าย: เลือกช่องข้อความ กด "Generate" แล้วชื่อจะถูกเปลี่ยนทันที
plugins.tagline: Generate Thai name

plugins.name: Recount
plugins.description:
Recount replaces text layers with a counter, starting from any number, based on the XY position of each selected layer.


How to use:

  1. select the layers to be counted
  2. run Recount
  3. enter a number to start from (or hit ENTER to choose 1)
  4. choose a direction to count along (or hit ENTER to use LTR)


Left-to-right and right-to-left directions are available.
plugins.tagline: Easily count layers by their position

117829.name: Recount
117829.description:
Recount replaces text layers with a counter, starting from any number, based on the XY position of each selected layer.


How to use:

  1. select the layers to be counted
  2. run Recount
  3. enter a number to start from (or hit ENTER to choose 1)
  4. choose a direction to count along (or hit ENTER to use LTR)


Left-to-right and right-to-left directions are available.
117829.tagline: Easily count layers by their position

plugins.name: Remove and select next
plugins.description:
😟 FIGMA NATIVE BEHAVIOR

-> Removing a layer triggers a global deselect.

Consequently, you need to take your mouse to select the next layer you want to work on.


🥳 PLUGIN BEHAVIOR

-> Removing a layer select the next layer.

Meaning you don't need to take your mouse back and you can continue to design at the speed of light on your keyboard!


⌨️ KEYBOARD SHORTCUT

Plugins can't have keyboard shortcuts so you'll have to set it on your own.

See this page for a tutorial on macOS native keyboard shortcuts and BetterTouchTools
plugins.tagline: Remove layers without leaving your keyboard

plugins.name: BrandLife
plugins.description: Seamlessly integrate your design workflow with BrandLife using the BrandLife Figma Plugin. Effortlessly import files from your BrandLife library directly into Figma and use them in your creative projects. Once your designs are ready, export assets back into BrandLife, ensuring they are correctly organized within the right assets and collections. Simplify collaboration, maintain brand consistency, and keep your assets organized—all from within Figma.

plugins.name: comodo exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you rename and export layers named $IMG in your Figma project based on special tags. You can choose between two workflows:

  1. Destructive export: Layers are renamed and export settings applied (JPG, PNG, SVG, @1x, @2x, @3x). Once renamed, the original $IMG layers are lost, and the plugin cannot be rerun unless you revert to an earlier version.
  2. Non-destructive export: The plugin creates a new page where it duplicates and renames all matching layers, preserving the original ones. You can delete the new page and restart anytime.

A Figma template will soon be provided with pre-set tags and an organized layout to make your workflow faster and more reliable. More detailed documentation will also follow.
plugins.tagline: Rename & export $IMG layers via tags. Template & docs coming soon for easy setup.

  2. Non-destructive export: The plugin creates a new page where it duplicates and renames all matching layers, preserving the original ones. You can delete the new page and restart anytime.

A Figma template will soon be provided with pre-set tags and an organized layout to make your workflow faster and more reliable. More detailed documentation will also follow.

plugins.name: Magic Todo
plugins.description:
Magic Todo lets you organize and track your to-dos without leaving Figma.


✅Tasks Tab (available now): create and rename folders, add & remove tasks, check tasks off to move them into your Completed list, and restore with one click. Everything is saved between sessions.


✨Magic Tasks Tab (coming soon): type or paste free-form requirements and click “Generate Magic Tasks” to have AI instantly spin up a new folder full of actionable tasks.


Use Magic Todo today to keep your design work on track—and watch for our AI-powered task generator in the next release.
plugins.tagline: Folder‐based task manager in Figma (Magic Tasks coming soon)

plugins.name: RouteMyPath
plugins.description:
RouteMyPath is a Figma plugin designed for runners, designers, and creators who want to bring their workout journeys into their visual work.


Upload a .gpx file from your running app (e.g., Strava, Garmin, etc.) and RouteMyPath will:

•Parse your route data

•Visualize it as editable vector paths

•Enable custom layout and styling in Figma


Ideal for designing performance recaps, social sharing visuals, or creating unique journey-based content right inside your Figma canvas.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that turns your GPX route data into editable design elements

137094.name: RouteMyPath
137094.description:

Upload a .gpx file from your running app (e.g., Strava, Garmin, etc.) and RouteMyPath will:

•Parse your route data

•Visualize it as editable vector paths

•Enable custom layout and styling in Figma


Ideal for designing performance recaps, social sharing visuals, or creating unique journey-based content right inside your Figma canvas.

plugins.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
plugins.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.


Features :


- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Work with current selection, page, or entire file

- See what will change before you apply it

- Handle thousands of variables at once

- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variables


How to use :


1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.

2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.

3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.


Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.


RoadMap :


- Find all variables used in your designs

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.
plugins.tagline: Master all your variable workflows

136575.description:

Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.

plugins.name: Detach variables
plugins.description:
Detacher – Take Full Control Over Figma Variables

Tired of wasting time manually detaching variables? Detacher is your all-in-one solution to quickly scan, preview, and detach variables from your selection — with full control and confidence.


✅ What Makes Detacher Better?


Visual Variable Summary

Instantly see how many variables (Colors, Text, Numbers, Others) exist in your selection, with a live count and total — at a glance.


Smart Selection Control

Choose exactly what you want to detach — Colors, Text, Numbers, Others, or Typography — using simple checkboxes.


Typography Variable Support

Detach all typography-related variables, including mixed styles and both string & number-based properties (like font size, line height, letter spacing, paragraph spacing, and indent).


Preview Before Detach 🛡️

Optional “Preview Changes” mode lets you review exactly what’s about to change — no accidental detaching, no surprises.


One-click Detach

Once you're ready, just hit the Detach Variables button and move on. No friction, no bloated UI, no hidden steps.


⚙️ How It Works

  1. Select your frame, group, or section.
  2. Launch the plugin.
  3. Pick the variable types you want to detach.
  4. Preview (optional) → Confirm → Done.


https://buymeacoffee.com/habeebrahman


Future-Proof & Community-Focused

We're continuously testing new scenarios, but bugs can happen — so please send your feedback 🙏

Exciting features are already in the pipeline!
plugins.tagline: Detach differnet types of variables in a frame effortlessly !

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
138487.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: Design Roaster
plugins.description:
Design Analyzer & Enhancer is your intelligent Figma assistant, designed to help you elevate your designs to the next level. With a single click, this plugin scans your entire Figma file, analyses your current design, and delivers a comprehensive review—including pros, cons, and actionable recommendations for improvement.

But that’s not all: inspired by your existing work, Design Analyzer & Enhancer also proposes an enhanced design concept, offering you a creative starting point for your next iteration. Whether you’re seeking a quick design audit or looking for fresh inspiration, this plugin empowers designers of all levels to create more polished, user-friendly, and visually compelling interfaces.

Key Features

• Automated Design Analysis: Instantly review your design’s strengths and areas for improvement.

• Actionable Recommendations: Get practical tips and suggestions tailored to your specific design.

• Proposed Enhanced Designs: Explore new design directions generated based on your current work.

• Easy to Use: One-click operation, no complex setup required.

• Boost Your Creativity: Use AI-powered insights to inspire your next great design.

• Transform your workflow, catch overlooked issues, and get inspired—all without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Designer's companion for better UX/UI by ABA Bank

plugins.name: Brand compliance check
plugins.description:
Branding compliance check Figma Plugin


Purpose

The Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.


Features

  1. Design Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.
  2. Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.


Usage guidelines

  1. Select Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.
  2. Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.
plugins.tagline: Quick sanity checks for Figma files to verify if design elements of file are brand library aligned

plugins.name: 핸드오프러브
plugins.description:
이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

나만의 발자님을 위한 사랑스러운 디자이너가 되어보세요



OVERVIEW

디자인 수정을 요청할 때, 핸드오프 문서를 전달할 때, QA를 진행할 때...

디자이너와 발자님과의 관계는 항상 위태롭습니다.

서로의 언어가 달라서 오해가 생길 때,

‘핸드오프러브’로 사랑이 담긴 핸드오프 러브레터를 보내보세요!


HOW IT WORKS

발자님께 전할 내용을 입력하고 발자님의 언어를 선택하기만 하면,

사랑스러운 핸드오프 내용으로 변환되어 내 피그마에 러브레터가 첨부됩니다.


FEATURES


1. 8개 이상의 개발 언어를 연인 스타일로 지원

Python부터 Java, JS, SQL, Go, TypeScript, C++, 그리고 Android 개발자를 위한 Kotlin 언어를 지원하며 각 언어에 특화된 말투와 이미지가 지원됩니다.


2. 사랑이 담긴 고급 프롬프트 패턴 엔진

수개월 간 직접 설계한 각 언어 별 프롬프트 패턴이 적용되어 있으며, 수많은 연애 경험을 살려 고안한 실전 문장으로 변환됩니다.


3. 디자이너 취향저격 러브레터 디자인

문장 입력만으로 사랑가득한 러브레터 카드가 자동 생성되며 텍스트 수정도 가능합니다.


4. 복사 버튼으로 슬랙/노션에 바로 붙여넣기

핸드오프가 메모처럼 가볍고 예뻐지는 순간을 경험해보세요


5. 발자님과의 갈등을 없애는 최적의 팀워크 도구

단순 문장을 사랑스럽게 바꾸는 것을 넘어 실제 개발자들이 디자이너의 말을 오해 없이 받아들이고, 더 나아가 사랑이 시작될지도...


6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결

오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.


문의할 내용이 있다면,

doingseo0906@gmail.com으로 언제든지 연락주세요 :>
plugins.tagline: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결

오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.


문의할 내용이 있다면,

Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.

plugins.name: Motionmill
plugins.description:
Prepare Your Figma File for Development with This Plugin


This Figma plugin helps you set up a well-organized and developer-friendly design file from the start. It allows you to quickly define and document your color palette and typography styles—both as Figma styles and directly within the design file.


By standardizing colors and text styles early in the process, you create a solid foundation for a consistent visual identity and a smoother handoff to development. Developers can easily reference the documented styles and convert them into design tokens or variables in code (e.g., CSS variables or a design system setup). This includes font families, sizes, line heights, and color codes—all clearly named and structured.


This plugin is perfect for teams looking to streamline collaboration between design and development. It saves time, reduces confusion, and ensures consistency throughout the project.
plugins.tagline: Colors and Typography for Motionmill

132803.name: Motionmill
132803.description:
Prepare Your Figma File for Development with This Plugin


This Figma plugin helps you set up a well-organized and developer-friendly design file from the start. It allows you to quickly define and document your color palette and typography styles—both as Figma styles and directly within the design file.


By standardizing colors and text styles early in the process, you create a solid foundation for a consistent visual identity and a smoother handoff to development. Developers can easily reference the documented styles and convert them into design tokens or variables in code (e.g., CSS variables or a design system setup). This includes font families, sizes, line heights, and color codes—all clearly named and structured.


This plugin is perfect for teams looking to streamline collaboration between design and development. It saves time, reduces confusion, and ensures consistency throughout the project.

plugins.name: 앱스토어 리뷰 추출기 (Appstpre Review Extractor)
plugins.description:
🧩 애플 앱스토어 리뷰를 Figma 프레임에 손쉽게 가져와 정리하세요

Easily import and organize Apple App Store reviews into your Figma frames


이 플러그인은 Apple App Store의 앱 리뷰를 가져와 평점별로 정리해줍니다.

사용자 피드백 분석, 제품 개선 준비, 인사이트 시각화 등 다양한 상황에서

실사용자 의견을 Figma 안에서 빠르고 효율적으로 표현할 수 있습니다.

→ This plugin fetches app reviews from the Apple App Store and organizes them by rating.

It's perfect for analyzing user feedback, planning improvements, and visualizing insights—all within Figma.


🔍 주요 기능 | Key Features

최근 평점별(5★, 4★ 등) 리뷰 가져오기 가능

→ Import recent reviews by rating (e.g., 5★, 4★)


현재 운영 중인 앱의 현황 확인, 고객의 pain point 확인

→ Check the current status of your app and identify user pain points


UX 리서치, 앱 디자인, 제품 문서화에 활용 가능

→ Use in UX research, app design, and product documentation


🛠 사용순서 | How to Use

1) 플러그인을 실행하세요

→ Launch the plugin


2) 사용하고자 하는 앱스토어 ID를 확인합니다

→ Find the App Store ID of your target app

(https://www.apple.com/kr/app-store/에서 앱 검색 후 주소창에 id숫자 확인/복사)

→ (Search the app on the App Store and copy the numeric id from the URL)


3) 해당 ID를 플러그인 입력창에 붙여넣습니다

→ Paste the ID into the plugin input field


4) 원하는 평점(예: 5★) 을 선택합니다

→ Select the desired rating (e.g., 5★)


5) "리뷰 불러오기" 버튼을 클릭합니다

→ Click the "Import Reviews" button

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.tagline: App Store 리뷰를 한눈에, 피그마로 정리하자 (in Figma, Check your app review)

2) 사용하고자 하는 앱스토어 ID를 확인합니다

→ Find the App Store ID of your target app

(https://www.apple.com/kr/app-store/에서 앱 검색 후 주소창에 id숫자 확인/복사)

5) "리뷰 불러오기" 버튼을 클릭합니다

→ Click the "Import Reviews" button
131231.release_notes: A help message has been added, and even if you don't select a frame, it will automatically generate one and input the review.A help message has been added, and even if you don't select a frame, it will automatically generate one and input the review. modify some information.

plugins.name: View Jumper
plugins.description: View Jumper helps designers quickly navigate large Figma files by creating visual bookmarks. Users set two key locations (View A and View B) that they need to reference frequently, then instantly teleport between them with preserved zoom levels and page context. Whether using the UI buttons, menu commands, or keyboard shortcuts, this plugin eliminates the frustration of constantly scrolling and searching through complex designs, making workflow significantly more efficient when comparing or referencing different areas.

accepted.name: Christopher
accepted.description:
Product Design @ heyo.is
Brand Design @ MARKoftheBRAND.com

plugins.tagline: Set viewpoints A & B. Teleport between design locations with a click.

130238.name: View Jumper
130238.description: View Jumper helps designers quickly navigate large Figma files by creating visual bookmarks. Users set two key locations (View A and View B) that they need to reference frequently, then instantly teleport between them with preserved zoom levels and page context. Whether using the UI buttons, menu commands, or keyboard shortcuts, this plugin eliminates the frustration of constantly scrolling and searching through complex designs, making workflow significantly more efficient when comparing or referencing different areas.
130238.tagline: Set viewpoints A & B. Teleport between design locations with a click.

plugins.name: LocalizeBuddy
plugins.description:
🌏 Introducing LocalizeBuddy for Figma — Your Ultimate i18n Export Companion!


LocalizeBuddy automatically extracts every text layer from your Figma file and converts it into clean, structured JSON—perfectly formatted for any localization pipeline. Skip the tedious copy-and-paste: design and ship faster with truly seamless internationalization. ✨


Standout Features:


🔍 Comprehensive Text Discovery

Auto-detects every text node, even deep inside groups, components, and nested frames.


🔑 Smart Key Mapping

Auto-generate consistent, position-based keys that mirror your design hierarchy—e.g. page1.frame2.text3—so every JSON entry is predictably unique without relying on layer-name transformations.


📂 Structured JSON Output

Preserve your art-board and frame hierarchy in the output to keep context clear for translators.


🖼️ Frame-Only Export

Export the selected frame in one click—ideal for precise, frame-level JSON extraction.

accepted.name: Alvin Bellero
accepted.description: Crafting code and building dreams, one line at a time 👨🏻‍💻🤞🚀

plugins.tagline: Effortless export Figma text layers as structured JSON in one click—instantly accelerate i18n setup!

133498.name: LocalizeBuddy
133498.description:
🌏 Introducing LocalizeBuddy for Figma — Your Ultimate i18n Export Companion!


LocalizeBuddy automatically extracts every text layer from your Figma file and converts it into clean, structured JSON—perfectly formatted for any localization pipeline. Skip the tedious copy-and-paste: design and ship faster with truly seamless internationalization. ✨


Standout Features:


🔍 Comprehensive Text Discovery

Auto-detects every text node, even deep inside groups, components, and nested frames.


🔑 Smart Key Mapping

Auto-generate consistent, position-based keys that mirror your design hierarchy—e.g. page1.frame2.text3—so every JSON entry is predictably unique without relying on layer-name transformations.


📂 Structured JSON Output

Preserve your art-board and frame hierarchy in the output to keep context clear for translators.


🖼️ Frame-Only Export

Export the selected frame in one click—ideal for precise, frame-level JSON extraction.
133498.release_notes:
- Now supports `Section` Node text extraction
- Replace `Export to CSV` with `Export to Excel`
133498.tagline: Effortless export Figma text layers as structured JSON in one click—instantly accelerate i18n setup!

plugins.name: CTRLFRK:GRAD
plugins.description:
GRAD gives you unprecedented control over colour transitions through the power of Bezier curves. This sophisticated plugin brings laboratory-grade precision to your gradient work through highly-customisable curves. Manipulate how colours blend across HSB components, visualise transitions in real-time, and achieve interpolation paths that were previously impossible. Perfect for brand work, illustrations, and UI design where colour transitions matter.


  1. Create expressive colour gradients with precise Bezier curve control
  2. Independently manipulate hue, saturation, and brightness curves for nuanced transitions
  3. Apply preset curves (ease-in, ease-out, S-curves) for common gradient effects
  4. Visualise and fine-tune with an interactive interface
  5. Generate exact colour stops based on mathematical interpolation
  6. Apply gradients directly to selected objects or create new gradient rectangles
plugins.tagline: Precision gradient control for the colour obsessed

plugins.name: Bulk Renamer
plugins.description:
Bulk Renamer 2.0


A powerful, user-friendly tool for renaming multiple frames or components in one go.


Bulk Renamer 2.0 lets you paste a list of names (typed manually, copied from Excel, or generated elsewhere) and instantly apply them to your selected frames — in the exact order and direction you choose.


⸻


✨ Features:

•Rename frames by typing or pasting names

•Smart support for Excel/Sheets cell pastes

•Auto-adds commas only when you press Enter

•Supports left-to-right or top-to-bottom frame direction

•Real-time validation for name count vs frame selection

•Clean, dark-themed UI with live feedback


⸻


🪄 How to use:

1.Select your frames/components in Figma

2.Choose your naming direction

3.Paste or type names (one per line)

4.Click Apply to rename all selected items
plugins.tagline: Rename multiple frames all at once.

plugins.name: Section Logger
plugins.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
plugins.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

129666.name: Section Logger
129666.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
129666.release_notes:
Release Note: Versión 1.1

Nuevas funcionalidades:
1.Soporte de idioma (Español/Inglés):
•Se ha implementado un selector de idioma en la UI del plugin, que permite cambiar entre español e inglés con un switch/slider intuitivo.
•El idioma de la interfaz (títulos, botones y textos) cambia dinámicamente según la selección del usuario.
•El texto de los logs registrados también cambia de idioma, mostrando la información correctamente tanto en español como en inglés, dependiendo del idioma seleccionado.
2.Actualización de sticker:
•Mejora de la gestión de stickers: Ahora, si un sticker ya existe, se actualiza con los nuevos logs en lugar de crear uno nuevo cada vez que se registra una edición.
•Si el sticker ya está presente, su contenido se limpia y se reemplaza con los nuevos logs, garantizando que no haya stickers duplicados.

Mejoras adicionales:
•Se mejoró el posicionamiento dinámico del sticker, asegurando que se mantenga correctamente ubicado en la esquina superior izquierda de la sección.
•Se optimizó el código para hacer el plugin más eficiente y evitar la creación de stickers innecesarios.

Fixes:
•Se solucionó un problema en el que un nuevo sticker se creaba cada vez que se registraba un log, incluso si ya existía uno previamente.
129666.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

plugins.name: Boxy
plugins.description: Boxy is a simple Figma plugin that makes layout properties easy to see. It overlays visual indicators for padding, element sizes, and autolayouts gaps between components—perfect for quickly checking your work or handing off accurate specs to developers.

plugins.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
plugins.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.
plugins.tagline: Automate. Validate. Elevate.

127028.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
127028.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access external resources for WCAG contrast checking and design pattern validation.

plugins.name: Outset Pr Invoice Plugin
plugins.description:
Invoice Filler Plugin for Outset PR


This plugin is specifically designed for Outset PR and works exclusively with their internal invoice template in Figma. It automates the process of populating the template with data submitted via the plugin’s form, streamlining the invoicing workflow for the company.


How It Works:


The plugin is built to integrate with a single invoice template used by Outset PR.

Users submit invoice data through the plugin's form.

The plugin then automatically fills the predefined fields in the Outset PR invoice template within Figma.


Limitation for Reviewers:


Since the plugin is tailored for Outset PR's proprietary invoice template, reviewers will not have access to the template for testing.


For Figma Reviewers:


To review the functionality of the plugin, please use mock data in the form. The plugin will generate a dummy page with the entered data displayed.

If you are a member of the Figma team, please fill out the form and review the data generated by the plugin to understand its intended functionality.


Key Features:


Specifically designed for Outset PR’s invoice template, allowing users to quickly populate the template with the required data.

Simplifies the invoicing process for Outset PR by eliminating manual data entry.

Optimized for seamless integration with a single internal template used by the company.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to fill invoices
